The novel delves into the world of cybercrime, exploring the dark side of the internet and the consequences of playing with fire.

Mike Crichton, a renowned author, is known for his meticulous research and ability to craft engaging, suspenseful stories that explore the intersection of technology and society. "The Trust" is a gripping and thought-provoking novel that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
